channel.title: Conceived In Liberty
channel.description: Three friends run an imaginary dictatorship on a remote Pacific island, exploring how dictatorships operate and how they can be prevented. Expect frequent tangents into current events, computer science, math, and daily life in the COVID pandemic. Join the Party!

item.title: 1: Conceived With Liberty
item.description:
Three friends finally act on their idea to start a podcast.
Talking points include: who we are, COVID-19, Paris Hilton, the biggest goldfish, state-controlled media in Hungary, Bloomberg's coverage of Bloomberg's campaign, twisting the good word of the U.S. Constitution, Casey's cat's bedtime, baking a nation from scratch.
